name: Bullying Blow
text: With a simple hit, you more easily intimidate an opponent.
benefit: As a standard action, you may make a melee attack with a –2 penalty on the attack roll. If the attack damages your opponent, you may make an Intimidate check to demoralize that opponent as a free action.
normal: Intimidating an opponent is a standard action.
staminaText: You can spend 2 stamina points to gain the effects of this feat on a single attack made as part of a full attack.
text_zh: 借助简单的一击，你可以更容易地吓住敌人。
benefit_zh: 以一个标准动作，你可以在攻击检定上承受-2罚值进行一次近战攻击。若该攻击对你的敌人造成伤害，你能以一个自由动作对该敌人进行一次挫败士气的威吓检定。
normal_zh: 威吓一名敌人是一个标准动作。
staminaText_zh: 花费2点耐力，你可以令全轮攻击中的一次攻击享受该专长效果。
